item.title: New compile error
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

i got a new compile error so can someone help me fix it?

client.java:1675: ';' expected ^ 1 error

and here is where it is in the client.

public void WriteBonus() { int offset = 0; String send = ""; for (int i = 0; i < playerBonus.length; i++) { if (playerBonus[i] >= 0) { send = BonusName[i]+": +"+playerBonus[i]; } else { send = BonusName[i]+": -"+java.lang.Math.abs(playerBonus[i]); } 
		if (i == 10) {
			offset = 1;
		}
		sendFrame126(send, (1675+i+offset));
	}</blockquote>

so can you help?

Read full topic
